ygData.subject: Deaths attack
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell Beast saw him coming, and moved, sending the spear into his shoulder. He turned to see Black Aracnia, and then she blasted death with her bowcaster. Hell

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast saw him coming, and moved, sending the spear into his 
shoulder. He turned to see Black Aracnia, and then she blasted death with her 
bowcaster. Hell Beast dug his pistol into the bots stomach, and fired.

--part1_46.e15680f.276e3311_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2 FAMILY="SANSSERIF" FACE="Century Gothic" LANG="0"><B>       Hell Beast saw him coming, and moved, sending the spear into his <BR>shoulder. He turned to see Black Aracnia, and then she blasted death with her <BR>bowcaster. Hell Beast dug his pistol into the bots stomach, and fired.</B></FONT></HTML>
